description:
Explore and uncover the mystery of a surreal alien world by blasting aliens and glitching your environment
in this intense retro side-scrolling action/adventure.

beta.description:
### APWorld Installation
Place in custom_worlds folder in your Archipelago directory


### Client Installation

- Currently Windows only:
- Ensure you're on the [earlyaccess] branch
  - Open steam and go to your games library
  - Right click Axiom Verge and click on Properties
  - Select Betas tab and enter the following beta access code ' secretworlds '
- Unzip AxiomVergeAP.zip in your local AV folder
- Run applyPatchFinal.bat
- Launch the game and verify "Archipelago" is on the main menu


### Known issues
- Leaving the room too quickly after picking up "Shaft Behind Telal" can cause a crash
- Receiving an item while in transit in Indi causes unexpected results.
- Lower Kur start is very untested and may result in unbeatable seeds.
beta.title: beta1

beta2.description:
### APWorld Installation
Place in custom_worlds folder in your Archipelago directory


### Client Installation

- Currently Windows only (though I'm told this works with Linux Proton):
- Ensure you're on the [earlyaccess] branch
  - Open steam and go to your games library
  - Right click Axiom Verge and click on Properties
  - Select Betas tab and enter the following beta access code ' secretworlds '
- Unzip AxiomVergeAP.zip in your local AV folder (For Steam: Right click > Manage > Browse Local Files)
- Run applyPatchFinal.bat
- Launch the game and verify "Archipelago" is on the main menu


### Known issues
- Receiving an item from the server can cause a crash if the prompt is dismissed too quickly.
- Leaving the room too quickly after picking up "Shaft Behind Telal" as the first item can cause a crash.


Additionally, Lower Kur start is still work in progress - and the initial check is significantly more difficult to get than other starts.
It's probably fine in mulitworld games, but will be quite difficult in solo play. Only recommended for those seeking a challenge!

beta2.1.description:
Minor fixes to both AP world and client while the next update comes along.

**Changes**
AP World - General
- Nodes are prog by default for better UT tracking. There are now 5 "progressive" nodes for logic purposes.
- Fragments are now filler.
- Secret world weapons option now actually works!

AP World - Logic
- Add Distortion Field to piercing weapons
- Re-write broken Primordial Caves upper logic
- Limit lab obscure fat beam to grapple only, add obscure tele + fat access
- Fix Kur Seamks being slightly in the wrong spot
- Rewrite Grapple cliffs logic
- Fix Indi being connected to the wrong part of Ukkin-Na
- Allow Grapple to damage bubbles/switches
- Fix incorrect glitch levels on Artichoker/Furglot
- Fix Edin Double check tunnel requirements that I forgot in the last one.
- Add a brown rocket option for getting Kur Peak Cliff Ledge
- Fix access to Cliffs behind Gir-Tab

AP Client Mod
- Update client library for compatibility with Archipelago 0.6.2
beta2.1.title: Beta 2.1

beta3.2.description:
## APWorld Installation
Place in custom_worlds folder in your Archipelago directory

## Client Installation
Currently Windows only (though I'm told this works with Linux Proton):
- Ensure you're on the [earlyaccess] branch
- Open steam and go to your games library
- Right click Axiom Verge and click on Properties
- Select Betas tab and enter the following beta access code 'secretworlds'
- Unzip AxiomVergeAP.zip in your local AV folder (For Steam: Right click > Manage > Browse Local Files)
- Run applyPatchFinal.bat
- Launch the game and verify "Archipelago" is on the main menu

## Changelog
**New feature: Universal Tracker Map Integration**
Features a full map of Sudra, with smaller maps for individual areas. Thanks to Seraphin for permission to use the Emotracker assets
With Glitchsanity enabled, enemies are grouped by area on the Sudra map, and per room on the area maps.
A dedicated tab for Glitchsanity enemies will be released in the future (soon™)

**Client**
This client update is **not mandatory** if you do not wish to use either of the below new features
- Enable handling of "start_inventory" and "start_inventory_from_pool" items.
- Enable auto-tabbing of Universal Tracker maps on area transitions
**Known Issues**
The start_inventory items seem to have resurfaced an old issue where items received during the initial load can potentially crash the client. This can be avoided by not touching any input until the item screen has finished displaying, or by re-creating the save if a crash does occur. If you experience issues outside of this, please let us know!

**APWorld**
Logic changes/fixes:
- Move Primordial Caves Lower access with just Red Coat into Obscure skips
- Add High Jump as a co-requirement for West Caves access with just Trenchcoat
- Add Red Coat alternative to Drone requirement for Eribu Sentry Bot Tunnel
- Add Any Coat as a co-requirement to Bomb access to glitch a Sentry Bot in said tunnel
- Add Displacement Warp option to Zi Lower Save Secret (thanks Athebyne!)
- Move Kur - Main Shaft from Upper Kur region to Lower Kur
- Add Displacement Warp option for Kur - Main Shaft (thanks Athebyne!)
- Add solo Drone as able to get Zi - False Ceiling Alcove (you guessed it, thanks Athebyne)
- Add Scissor Beam to weapons able to open Absu - Switch Cage (yeah, this one surprised me too)
- Fix some mix-ups in the logic of Cliffs Behind Gir-Tab shrine checks.
- Fix several instances of "FlameThrower" being "Flamethrower", causing it to not be considered in logic
- Fix Indi -> Ukkin-Na connection having an "and" instead of "or" on it's Grapple Clip alternative, causing it to never be in logic except on the hardest Grapple clip difficulty.
- Fix some enemy locations deliberately but incorrectly not placed in Ukkin-Na.
- Rework Edin - Sky Cage. It will now never expect a Grapple for access unless _both_ Roof clips and Obscure skips are enabled.
- Rework ascension rules for E-Kur-Mah shaft. Flight now works, and moved the ledge Grapple to Obscure skips.
beta3.2.title: Beta 3.2

beta3r2.description:
## APWorld Installation
Place in custom_worlds folder in your Archipelago directory

## Client Installation
Currently Windows only (though I'm told this works with Linux Proton):
- Ensure you're on the [earlyaccess] branch
- Open steam and go to your games library
- Right click Axiom Verge and click on Properties
- Select Betas tab and enter the following beta access code 'secretworlds'
- Unzip AxiomVergeAP.zip in your local AV folder (For Steam: Right click > Manage > Browse Local Files)
- Run applyPatchFinal.bat
- Launch the game and verify "Archipelago" is on the main menu

## Changelog
**General**
- New goal: Boss rush. Defeat the 8 bosses (Xedur, Telal, Uruku, Gir-Tab, Ukhu, Clone, Sentinel, and Xedur Hul), then defeat Athetos.
- New start: Kur peak. Begin outside of E-Kur-Mah, and descend the mountain. A slightly more challenging start, but less so than Lower Kur.
- APWorld will now send a "version" tag to the client. If it's below what the client expects, the connection will be refused with an error message.

**Client**
- Return to start no longer crashes the game when used in the in-game randomizer mode.
- The "inactive world" state, that disables upon picking up an item, has been removed for AP.
- Improvements to stability of receiving items. Please continue to report if you encounter weird behaviour in this space.
- Skip hallucination sequence in AP.
- Hide speedrun timer in AP. Boss kill times are still displayed as a means of Boss Rush tracking (until something better comes along...?)
- By community request: Always spawn Duraga in Vision room.
- Restore the sent item message box accidentally deleted when glitchsanity was implemented.
- Various error handling around the initial connection. Should handle common pitfalls, and provide a more helpful log.
- AP saves now store the seed of the room, and validate that seed against the new connection on resuming.
- Client version displays on title screen.
- Client doesn't attempt to send glitchsanity locations when glitchsanity is not enabled.
- Client will discard item received prompts after goaling. If the save file is reloaded, prompts will continue to appear as normal. 

**APWorld**
- Fix incorrect access rule on East Edin Will-o-Wisps.
- Remove Vision related logic.
- Simplify Above Vision Room requirement to just Drone, with the permanent Duraga change.
- Audit all Node requirements, they all respect the require_nodes option now.
- Add a Telal -> Lower Absu region connection.

## 0.3.1
- Fix access rule on Ukhu Spawn in glitchsanity.
- Allow Drone Tele to access upper Ukkin-Na, now hallucination is gone.
beta3r2.title: Beta 3
